snippet: Officials will know by early August whether the state can move forward with its own retooled health exchange or join the federal marketplace.
abstract: Massachusetts officials announce they will know by early August whether the state can move forward with its own retooled health exchange or join the federal marketplace.
lead_paragraph: Officials will know by early August whether the state can move forward with its own retooled health exchange or join the federal marketplace.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Decision on Health Site Expected
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Decision on Health Site Expected
